entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
